Text.content:
There are three sample React applications available that give application developers a quick introduction to how the JSON API works.

  • Demo 1 is the hello world of the JSON API. It introduces to how content can be retrieved with the JSON API.
  • Demo 2 explains how to access content lists configured by editors and how to dynamically sort and paginate lists.
  • Demo 3 illustrates how content with individual formattings configured by editors can be read and displayed.

The demos are no real-world use cases but short and simple examples to introduce frontend developers to the JSON API. The React source code is available online. It contains useful comments about technical details. Additionally, there is an API documentation that explains the features of the JSON API in detail.
